categories.body: The Legend of Korra episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: Cut to the police office, where Korra kicks the door open.
paragraphs.text: Cut to the police office, where Korra kicks the door open.

paragraphs.body: A giant dark spirit emerges and Korra dodges its attacks, but is knocked off her waterspout. Underwater, Korra enters the Avatar State and re-emerges. She attempts to purify the spirit, causing it to glow golden, except for the head. The spirit prepares to head underwater, but re-emerges at the last minute and proceeds to devour Korra. Korra futilely firebends at the spirit before being swallowed and dragged into the water below.
paragraphs.text: A giant dark spirit emerges and Korra dodges its attacks, but is knocked off her waterspout. Underwater, Korra enters the Avatar State and re-emerges. She attempts to purify the spirit, causing it to glow golden, except for the head. The spirit prepares to head underwater, but re-emerges at the last minute and proceeds to devour Korra. Korra futilely firebends at the spirit before being swallowed and dragged into the water below.

paragraphs.body: Cut to Eska and Desna, who have witnessed the entire incident. They leave the scene.
paragraphs.text: Cut to Eska and Desna, who have witnessed the entire incident. They leave the scene.
